Adam Brody


Adam Brody is an actor who is going to shine onscreen through an array of new ventures and fans of Adam Brody will be happy to learn that the actor is also one of the stars celebrating birthday today. Thus as he celebrates his birthday on 15th of December viewers will not think twice about hitting theaters in order to see the forthcoming ventures of the future. Though he might be best known for his character portrayals it should also be added that he is famous not only as an actor but also as a singer and writer. So he is one of the multi talented stars in the industry.
